1056.issue: [W1056] js-controller 5.0.19 listed as dependency but 6.0.11 is recommended. Please consider updating dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.iot/blob/master/io-package.json).

1074.issue: [W1074] Potential sensitive data "pass" not listed at "encryptedNative" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.iot/blob/master/io-package.json)

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.iot/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.iot/blob/master/io-package.json).

1094.issue: [S1094] Consider adding protected native "pass" to "encryptedNative" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.iot/blob/master/io-package.json)

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5023.issue: [S5023] "package-lock.json" not found in repo! Please consider to commit it to github repository.

8004.issue: [E8004] Please process issue [[#919] "Compatibility check and testing for node.js 24"](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.iot/issues/919)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0028.issue: [W0028] Minimum node.js version 20 recommended. Please adapt "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '20' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.iot/blob/master/package.json).

0037.issue: [W0037] @iobroker/eslint-config 2.1.0 specified. 2.2.0 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.iot/blob/master/package.json)
